attributes.action: End mps having other incomes and interests
attributes.additional_details: The amount of hours and money that’s wasted by high officials and mps while they sit rich and happy when so many more are struggling , they use there positions to gain more for themselfs and to benefit  themselfs and no matter how good or bad they do they will always be rich and always have benefits , it’s time to end all this corruption  , public servants working for the public not themselfs
attributes.background: The House of Lords and House of Commons should only work for the people and serve the people and not be wasting tax payers money while they chase more income for themselfs and better themselfs while the public suffer

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/630900
